attributes.action: Introduce clear, mandatory sentences for carrying knives or firearms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Mandatory sentence of 2 years for the carrying of a knife + 1 extra year per inch or part of an inch of the blade. 

2. Mandatory sentence of 5 years for the carrying of a firearm + 2 extra years for reduced barrel length (total 7 years), + 5 extra years for semi or automatic weapons (total 10 years).
Everyone would then know where they stand if they choose to arm themselves and there can be no complaints.
They could even calculate how long they will serve before leaving home!
